directions: Place all ingredients for roast, except roast in blender. Blend well till smooth,. Place roast in pan; pour blended mixture over roast. Bake at 400 for 1 hour, then bake at 325 4 hours, then lower to 250 for hour and half, so about 6 hours alltogether,covered, Baste roast occasionally while cooking.
Shred cooked pork. Heat a skillet, add some oil about tbsp, add chopped onion, and

shredded pork and salt and pepper if needed, cook til crisp, flip over other side then turn off the heat, mean while, heat up flour tortillas, just till plyable, put some mexican cheese in the middle, then pile on the pork, fold burrito, place on well greased dish and cook 350 in toaster oven, till brown and crisp, remove from oven and slice on the diagonal, and pour on the enchilada sauce and sprinkle some cheese, serve with carrots and spinach, or beans and rice, enjoy,
title: Mexican Pork Roast Burritos
